name: BanchoStingmon
effect: ＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)[When Attacking] If you attack an opponent's Digimon that has 12000 DP or more, this Digimon gets +7000 DP and ＜Security Attack +2＞ (This Digimon checks 2 additional security cards) for the turn.
